mapper.insert:
insert into contest_problem
id,
contest_id,
remote_oj,
remote_problem_id,
edited_problem_id,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{contestId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{remoteOj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remoteProblemId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{editedProblemId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.select:
select
from contest
,user
and title like '%${title}%'
and contest.user_id = user.id and user.account_name = #{accountName}
and start_time > UNIX_TIMESTAMP()*1000
and start_time < UNIX_TIMESTAMP()*1000 and (start_time+duration) > UNIX_TIMESTAMP()*1000
and (start_time+duration) < UNIX_TIMESTAMP()*1000
order by contest.id

select count(*) from contest
,user
and title like '%${title}%'
and contest.user_id = user.id and user.account_name = #{accountName}
and start_time > UNIX_TIMESTAMP()*1000
and start_time < UNIX_TIMESTAMP()*1000 and (start_time+duration) > UNIX_TIMESTAMP()*1000
and (start_time+duration) < UNIX_TIMESTAMP()*1000
mapper.insert: insert into contest (id, title, start_time, duration, user_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{duration,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into contest
id,
title,
start_time,
duration,
user_id,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{startTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{duration,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update contest
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
duration = #{duration,jdbcType=BIGINT},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into edited_problem
id,
remote_oj,
remote_problem_id,
url,
title,
time_limit,
memory_limit,
description,
input,
output,
sample_input,
sample_output,
hint,
author,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{remoteOj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remoteProblemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{timeLimit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{memoryLimit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{input,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{output,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sampleInput,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sampleOutput,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{hint,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update edited_problem
remote_oj = #{remoteOj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remote_problem_id = #{remoteProblemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
time_limit = #{timeLimit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
memory_limit = #{memoryLimit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
input = #{input,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
output = #{output,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sample_input = #{sampleInput,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sample_output = #{sampleOutput,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hint = #{hint,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
